sub_title: Consultant at Trimont Real Estate Advisors-EMEA
summary:
17 years of experience in the financial industry, thereof 10 years in banking, and 4 years in Commercial Real Estate Debt Finance. I have a proven track record in linking corporate vision to the delivery of desired results and the effective use of resources, processes and technologies to maximize efficiency while maintaining appropriate risk tolerance levels.
 
I enjoy analyzing processes and finding smart solutions. I am known for my practical approach to problem solving and a drive to see things through to completion. I am eager to learn new things and I enjoy overcoming challenges. While I have the ability to work independently, I am a strong team player with good communication skills and enjoy convincing people with facts-based arguments.

[{'company': {'id': 27930, 'name': 'Trimont Real Estate Advisors', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEXhUG0HAhWjw/company-logo_400_400/0/1586978349507?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=SbvYppadxuj4y89vChY4rAg3bIEwsE5qV6SDtd0lHmU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/trimont-real-estate-advisors/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'EMEA', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Trimont', 'description': '•	Creating Excel models reflecting highly structured CRE Loans by reviewing the Facility Agreements, Inter Creditor Agreements, Common Terms Agreements, loan syndications, Fee letters.

•	Created basic Repo model – Interest calculations / Interest Notices / Payment Instructions 
•	Working with multiple banks and treasury applications to process transactions.
•	Actively participating in a new credit system testing with an external company for Trimont EMEA.
•	Instrumental in transferring the loan portfolio under administration to the new credit system and ensuring the external provider develops required functionalities to properly reflect the transactions (reference from credit system provider available upon request).
•	Handling highly structured CRE Finance Transactions in the daily administration (Interest notices/ Drawdown Notices/ Rate Set Notices / Loan Balance Confirmations / Audit confirmations) including contact with clients (CRE Funds, Hedge Funds)
•	Reconciliations (Interest – SONIA / LIBOR / EURIBOR )  GBP / USD / EUR
•	Researching on new applications on credits, rates, methods.
•	Created and optimized EMEA monitoring data base model (Excel) to ensure quality of work product and team performance (IPD Credit Portfolio Tracker / Loan Ops Tracker / Payments Tracker / Accounts Model) 
•	Executed payments in all stages of the internal process and maintained treasury relevant information in self-developed database.
